ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 32
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Thanks  There Should be an In game Bug report that you can check What happens to you agaisnt .. But Then agin . that would show ALL the Bugs in teh game
ygData.messageBody:
Joe-Sebastian Cadiz wrote:

> From: "Joe-Sebastian Cadiz" <nip3chi@...>
>
> I believe this is a boat bug, if you stand on the top level of the boat, you
> freeze up, loose all your hotkeys, and get to start up again
> on the boat, on the way back to qeynos, i was told it is two bugs kind
> of working together, one crash bug one bug nixes your hotkeys
>

Thanks There Should be an In game Bug report that you can check What happens to you agaisnt .. But Then agin . that would show ALL the Bugs in teh game now Wouldn't it ..




--

Jamie Macdonald
